projectName: Preparation of Project Execution Designs for Urban Trails in Tirana

complianceCriteria.name: AADF Application Package Completed
complianceCriteria.description: Application package completed in every section in English, original order, with all required documentation attached.

complianceCriteria.name: Similar Contracts Experience
complianceCriteria.description: Minimum of three (maximum of five evaluated) contracts of similar works. Check specific qualifying criteria.

complianceCriteria.name: Payroll for Last Three Months
complianceCriteria.description: Evidence of payroll for the last three months (salary details not needed).

complianceCriteria.name: QKB Simple Extract
complianceCriteria.description: Business registration extract (QKB for Albanian entities). N/A if public institution.

complianceCriteria.name: Key and Non-key Experts List
complianceCriteria.description: Name list of Key and Non-key experts with CVs, diplomas, and credentials (licenses, certificates, qualifications).

complianceCriteria.name: Work Plan
complianceCriteria.description: Work Plan submitted as per requirements.

complianceCriteria.name: Licenses (Company & Experts)
complianceCriteria.description: Required licenses for the company and key experts.

details.note: Specific roles may require specific licenses from this list (See Team Assessment). Substitution logic may apply (e.g., 1C for 1B).

complianceCriteria.name: Criminal Record Certificate
complianceCriteria.description: Certificate from Prosecution Office and Ministry of Justice for entity and legal representative.

complianceCriteria.name: Certificate of No Pending Lawsuit/Criminal Case
complianceCriteria.description: Certificate from Court evidencing no pending lawsuit/criminal case.

complianceCriteria.name: Certificate of Good Standing
complianceCriteria.description: Certificate from Court evidencing not in liquidation/bankruptcy (Albanian entities).

complianceCriteria.name: Tax Clearance Certificates
complianceCriteria.description: Certificates from national and local tax authorities.

complianceCriteria.name: Audited Financial Statements & Turnover
complianceCriteria.description: Copies of audited financial statements (e.g., 2023) and turnover certificates (e.g., 2024).

complianceCriteria.name: Contracts of Outsourced Staff
complianceCriteria.description: Contracts for outsourced staff if conditional on tender award and part of full-time staff.

complianceCriteria.name: Disclosure of Conflict of Interest
complianceCriteria.description: Disclosure statement regarding conflict of interest with AADF directors/managers.

evaluationScale.guideReference: Evaluation Guide Descriptions (Excellent, Very Good, Good, Fair, Unqualifiable, Inadequate)

priceCriteria.name: Financial Offer Score / Normalised
priceCriteria.description: Score based on the lowest qualified tender price.

nonPriceCriteria.name: Prior Relevant experience of the company
nonPriceCriteria.description: Assesses company's track record on similar projects.

subCriteria.name: Minimum Contract Fulfillment
subCriteria.description: Based on meeting min 3 similar contracts, including 1 > 50% ceiling value.

subCriteria.name: Additional Similar Contracts
subCriteria.description: Points for relevant contracts beyond the minimum (up to max 5 total evaluated).

nonPriceCriteria.name: Experience in similar urban trails' design
nonPriceCriteria.description: Demonstrated experience (company or experts) specifically in urban trail design.

nonPriceCriteria.name: Qualifications of core team experts
nonPriceCriteria.description: Assesses qualifications and experience of proposed key personnel.

subCriteria.name: CCE - Civil Construction Engineer / Road Construction Engineer

requiredRoles.roleName: Civil Construction Engineer / Road Construction Engineer

requiredRoles.requiredDegree: transportation planning/civil engineering for infrastructure/urban planning
